00020 #define SRTM_DATA_VOID -32768

00022 #define SRTM_FILE_COUNT 14047

00029 class SrtmTile
00030 {
00031     public:
00032         SrtmTile(QString file, int lat, int lon);
00033         ~SrtmTile();
00034         int getPixelValue(int x, int y);
00035         float getAltitudeFromLatLon(float lat, float lon);
00036     private:
00047         float avg(float a, float b, float weight) {
00048             if (a == SRTM_DATA_VOID) return b;
00049             if (b == SRTM_DATA_VOID) return a;
00050             return b * weight + a * (1 - weight);
00051         }
00052         int lat;
00053         int lon;
00054         qint16 *buffer;
00055         QFile file;
00056         int size;
00057         bool valid;
00058 };
